title: tiruvaruL tandaruLvAi
sahitya:
tiruvaruL tandaruLvAi dEvi nin tiruvaDiyaladoru tuNai ariyA enakku nin


anupallavi

  uruvamillAda nI karuNaiyinAl pala uruvamOD-ulagengum kOvil koNdAi nin


caraNam 1    shyAmaLa saundari cAmuNDEshvari shankaran pangurai dIna dayApari nin
  caraNam 2    un padam nambinEn O jagan mAthA un pugazh pADi vAzhvinburavE enakku nin
